OHOS::UITextureMapper
=====================

**Overview**\ 
--------------

**Related Modules:**

`Graphic <graphic.md>`__

**Description:**

Rotates and scales images.

**Since:**

1.0

**Version:**

1.0

**Summary**\ 
-------------

Data Structures
---------------

.. raw:: html

   <table>

.. raw:: html

   <thead align="left">

   <p id="p70263412093534">

Data Structure Name

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </th>

.. raw:: html

   <th class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" id="mcps1.1.3.1.2">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1795532524093534">

Description

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </th>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   </thead>

.. raw:: html

   <tbody>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row1307589063093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p2097344387093534">

AnimatorStopListener

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p450503750093534">

Represents a listener that contains a callback to be invoked when this
animator stops.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   </tbody>

.. raw:: html

   </table>

GetTransformAlgorithm () const

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p137937737093534">

TransformAlgorithm

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p185130321093534">

Obtains the algorithm used for image rotation and scaling.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row1369017270093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row1149484227093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p47025066093534">

IsVisible () const

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p765740445093534">

bool

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p635848475093534">

Checks whether the view is visible.

   </td>

   </tr>

Checks whether the view is draggable.

   <tr id="row1851120792093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p2094297313093534">

SetDragParentInstead (bool dragParentInstead)

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p786553934093534">

void

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p500200090093534">

Sets whether to transfer the drag event to the parent view for
processing when the view is being dragged.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row289811217093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p903806834093534">

IsDragParentInstead () const

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1788805506093534">

bool

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p273426339093534">

Obtains whether the view transfers a drag event to the parent view for
processing.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row2128880929093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1366555962093534">

GetRect () const

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p408564069093534">

Rect

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1452592048093534">

Obtains the absolute rectangle area of the view. When the view has
deformation such as rotation, the rectangle area is the intersection set
of the absolute rectangle area and deformation matrix.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row360879439093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p441056655093534">

GetVisibleRect () const

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p899356151093534">

Rect

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p693021362093534">

Obtains the visible absolute rectangle area of the view.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row1978237444093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1411357627093534">

GetMaskedRect () const

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p913125138093534">

Rect

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1968896038093534">

Obtains the valid absolute rectangle area of the view. The valid area
refers to the area where the view can be displayed. Generally, the valid
area is the same as the visible view area, but they may be different in
the grid layout.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row1921741147093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p2025096803093534">

GetOrigRect () const

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1598507089093534">

Rect

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p951167024093534">

Obtains the absolute rectangle area of the view.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row351176013093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1998362790093534">

GetContentRect ()

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p95074315093534">

virtual Rect

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1883135246093534">

Obtains the content of the absolute rectangle area of the view. This
area excludes padding.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row1570500902093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1259349490093534">

GetRelativeRect () const

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1692332771093534">

Rect

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1959062039093534">

Obtains the rectangular area of the view relative to the parent view,
that is, the rectangular area relative to the coordinates of the parent
view.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row1948535829093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p843547684093534">

ResizeVisibleArea (int16_t x, int16_t y, int16_t width, int16_t height)

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1294228597093534">

void

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p666324349093534">

Adjusts the size of the visible area. This operation may affect the
final display size.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row1105895021093534">

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1204431635093534">

Checks whether the view is a container view.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row9095313093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1509863763093534">

SetIntercept (bool isIntercept)

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p757253086093534">

void

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p2094076743093534">

Sets whether to intercept the drag event. If intercepted, the view does
not transfer the drag event to the parent view after local processing.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row605760785093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

   <p id="p48401949093534">

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

const Style &

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p859933101093534">

style does not need to be modified, which saves memory.

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row1659803710093534">

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p1547982123093534">

algorithm\_: 1

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">
